title: TERMS OF USE
intro: By creating an account on the Starlette website, you agree to the following:

personalUse.title: PERSONAL USE ONLY
personalUse.text: The account is strictly for personal use. It may not be shared.

accurateInfo.title: ACCURATE INFORMATION
accurateInfo.text: You agree to provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information when registering.

accountSecurity.title: ACCOUNT SECURITY
accountSecurity.text: You are responsible for keeping your login details secure.

booking.title: BOOKING & CANCELLATION POLICY
booking.text: Bookings can be cancelled up to 24 hours before the class starts, and up to 12 hours prior for members. After this window, the credit will automatically be deducted.

classPack.title: CLASS PACK VALIDITY
classPack.text: Purchased credits have an expiration date specified at the time of purchase. No extensions will be granted, except in exceptional cases.

subscriptions.title: SUBSCRIPTIONS & COMMITMENT
subscriptions.text: All subscriptions require a minimum commitment of 3 months. A one-month notice is required to cancel.

conduct.title: STUDIO CONDUCT
conduct.text: Respect for staff, fellow clients, and equipment is essential. Any inappropriate behavior may result in suspended access to the studio.

safety.title: SAFETY & MANDATORY EQUIPMENT
safety.text: For your safety, grip socks are mandatory during all sessions. Socks are available for purchase in the studio.

privacy.title: DATA PRIVACY
privacy.text: Your personal data is handled with strict confidentiality, in accordance with our privacy policy.
